QuestData.Title: Assemble the Forsaken
QuestData.Description:
It's heartening to see progress has been made in rebuilding Brill, but this is only a first step. The ruins of the capital remain inaccessible because of the blight.
And here is where I hope you will aid the cause.
Restoring as much of the land as possible will require a gathering of minds all working toward a singular purpose.
A number of influential figures have risen to prominence among the Forsaken. Please help bring them together so we can meet and discuss the path forward.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assemble Dark Ranger Velonara, Lillian Voss, and Master Apothecary Faranell.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Lilian Voss in the Brill Inn.
